title: BabyFirstTV Presents Vocabulary Seeds
description: Hearing a baby s first words is a gradual and highly rewarding process. VOCABULARY SEEDS guides you and your baby through this process in a caring, fun manner in three easy steps: Baby s First Words, Words in Context and Baby s First Stories. As you and your baby meet the unique characters and animals that inhabit the award-winning world of Baby First, you will both enjoy and cherish this enriching and entertaining DVD.VOCABULARY SEEDS features segments from: Hide and SeekSafari ScrapbookYoyo & Peanut ShowSandmanTell Me A StoryWordies
